Synopsis: This color converter gives you the hexadecimal values of your RGB colors and vice versa (RGB to HEX)
Description: This color converter gives you the hexadecimal values of your RGB colors and vice versa (RGB to HEX). Use it to convert your colors and prepare your graphics and HTML web pages.

Examples.Title: EXAMPLE 1
Examples.Code:
.\convert-color -hex FFFFFF
Converts hex value FFFFFF to RGB

Examples.Title: EXAMPLE 2
Examples.Code:
.\convert-color -RGB 123,200,255
Converts Red = 123 Green = 200 Blue = 255 to Hex value
